results.title: Hair regrowth in 2 patients with recalcitrant central centrifugal cicatricial alopecia after use of topical metformin
results.text_hl: B, @<m>DISEASE_Hair_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006201 @@@Hair@@@ regrowth after 4 months of topical 10% @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Araoye EF, Thomas JAL, Aguh CU. Hair regrowth in 2 patients with recalcitrant central centrifugal cicatricial alopecia after use of topical metformin JAAD Case Rep. 2020 Feb;6(2):106-108. PMID: 32016152

results.title: A novel mutation in the proopiomelanocortin (POMC) gene of a Hispanic child: metformin treatment shows a beneficial impact on the body mass index.
results.text_hl: Over a 3-year @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment span, the BMI decreased from 34.9 kg/m2 to 32.9 kg/m2.

citations.NLM: Hilado MA, Randhawa RS. A novel mutation in the proopiomelanocortin (POMC) gene of a Hispanic child: metformin treatment shows a beneficial impact on the body mass index. J Pediatr Endocrinol Metab. 2018 Jul 26;31(7):815-819. PMID: 29858905
